1.title: Bt and channel 4 present... Jonnie
1.plot: Gold medal-winning sprinter jonnie peacock talks about his london 2012 triumph, when he booked his place in british sporting history.

1.title: Bt and channel 4 present... Nathan stephens: warrior
1.plot: Paralympic javelin world champion nathan stephens takes the viewer on a journey through london, sharing his thoughts as he prepares for his battle to win gold at the london 2012 paralympic games.

2.title: Bt and channel 4 present... Liz johnson: night swimmer
2.plot: Welsh paralympic swimming champion liz johnson visits london by night to contemplate what the city means to her, as she makes her final preparations for the london 2012 paralympic games.

3.title: Bt and channel 4 present... Lee pearson: lone rider
3.plot: A stunning portrait of britain's most celebrated paralympic dressage athlete, lee pearson, as he journeys through london on horseback, and prepares for london 2012.

4.title: Bt and channel 4 present... Oscar pistorius: one giant leap
4.plot: Oscar pistorius shares what london means to him as he travels through the city at night, and contemplates the idea of one giant leap across tower bridge.

5.title: Bt and channel 4 present... London dreaming
5.plot: The paralympic hopefuls share their thoughts and feelings as they travel through london at night to arrive at their paralympic venues and contemplate the stage where they all hope to make history.

imdb.title: BT and channel 4 present
plot: A series of short films profiling some of the world's top Paralympic athletes as they make their way towards the great stage that is London 2012
